<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
  <project name="ContentMigration" default="migration-type" basedir=".">
     <property name="content_staging" value="psapp4-adev.usps.com" /> 

     <property name="MailLogger.mailhost" value="${mailHost}" /> 
     <property name="MailLogger.from" value="Darin_Swanson@us.ibm.com" /> 
     <property name="MailLogger.failure.notify" value="true" /> 
     <property name="MailLogger.success.notify" value="true" /> 
     <property name="MailLogger.failure.to" 
value="Darin_Swanson@us.ibm.com" /> 
     <property name="MailLogger.success.to" 
value="Darin_Swanson@us.ibm.com" /> 
     <property name="MailLogger.failure.subject" value="Build_FAILED" /> 
     <property name="MailLogger.success.subject" value="Build_Succeeded" /> 

     <target name="migration-type">
       <echo message="test" /> 
	<echoproperties></echoproperties>
       <echo message="done" /> 
     </target>
  </project>
